article_text:
4-H is much more than showing livestock, baking and sewing. In fact, the boys and girls organization promotes everything from positive attitudes, science, technology, even shooting sports. You'll see the vast reach of 4-H on this edition of Inside KELOLAND. To look for a club in your area or learn more about specific programs, visit iGrow.

A ground-breaking was just held at the South Dakota State Fair, making way for the new Nordby Exhibit Hall. Details on the SD State Foundation and its efforts to make the new facility a reality.

Plus, the city of Yankton is looking for the next big thing. Details on the competition through Onward Yankton on this edition of Inside KELOLAND.
